metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16393 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Several buffer overflows when handling responses from a Gemsafe V1 Smartcard in gemsafe_get_cert_len in libopensc/pkcs15-gemsafeV1.c in OpenSC before 0.19.0-rc1 could be used by attackers able to supply crafted smartcards to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: opensc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19.0-1build1').
